oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Edwin L. Higgins' sword
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sword belonging to Edwin L. Higgins (24 January 1873 to 1 July 1875). Born in Missouri. Served w/Co. I, 7th Illinois Volunteer Infantry, USA. (90 days). Served with Co. K, 33rd Illinois Volunteer Infantry and was wounded at Vicksburg. He was appointed captain in 1864 and was made an Asst. Adjutant General in 1869. He was married to Mary J. Hoskins.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Fort Negley, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
